title: Women political participation in developing coun..

content.question: Which of the following best describes womenâ€™s participation in politics in the developing world?

choices.label: Political participation is prohibited for everyone in these countries, not just women.
There is little interest from women in becoming politically involved.
Traditional cultural values often preclude women from participating in politics.
Women in rural areas participate in politics more often than women in urban areas.
Women in developing countries participate in politics more actively than women in the developed world.

content.answer: Traditional cultural values often preclude women from participating in politics.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
